This report on `pkgnet` is generated by [`pkgnet`](https://uptakeopensource.github.io/pkgnet/), an R package for analyzing other R packages through the lens of [network theory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Network_theory). 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pkgnet)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    echo = FALSE
    , warning=FALSE
    , out.width='100%'
)
pkgnet:::silence_logger()

reporters <- list(DependencyReporter$new(), FunctionReporter$new())

reporters <- lapply(
          X = reporters
          , FUN = function(reporter){
              reporter$set_package(pkg_name = "pkgnet", NULL )
              return(reporter)
          }
      )

```

```{r warning=FALSE}
reportSections <- lapply(reporters, function(reporter) {
  report_env <- list2env(list(reporter = reporter))
  knitr::knit_child(
    reporter$report_markdown_path
    , envir = report_env
  )
})

```

```{r results="asis"}
cat(paste0(paste(reportSections, collapse = '\n')))
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
pkgnet:::unsilence_logger()
```
